channel.title: Pages on tek256
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on tek256

item.title: Services
item.description: Currently I’m offering a variety of different services, you can find my resume here: Commissioned Work Contracted Work Consulting Tutoring Here are the different types of projects I’m open to working on! If you don’t see something on here that you’d like to ask about, definitely email me and ask! Game Development Game Engine Development Graphics / Rendering Development Enterprise Software General Software Development Front End Web Development Back End Web Development Full Stack Web Development Here are some of the programming languages I’m most comfortable with:

item.title: Tutoring
item.description: Looking to get started in C? Maybe you want to learn programming from nothing! I offer tutoring & mentoring services open to everyone! Tutoring Tutoring is where I’ll prepare materials beforehand and help teach & solve problems in real time over a voice / video call. Here are the languages I can help teach: C C++ Java C# PHP HTML / CSS / Javascript As well I can help tutor in Computer Science theory & fundamentals!

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Question Index: How old are you? Where are you from? Are you going to school for Computer Science? What’s your day job? What languages do you know? What OS do you use? What’s your computer build? What keyboard do you use? What languages do you use for Game Development? Why C? How did you learn to write code?

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: For access to most of these projects, you can go thru the descriptions, or check my GitHub for the relevant repositories!Please note: a few of these projects are still under active development, and are subject to change! Astera Astera is one of my primary projects currently. It’s a cross platform game library written in C99. The technologies it uses are: C, CMake, GLFW, OpenGL, OpenAL, nanovg, stb image & vorbis, and GLAD.

item.title: Resume
item.description: .resume_wrapper { min-width 640px; width: 100%; display: inline-block; padding: 0; margin: 0; } .resume_left { width: 75%; margin-right: 10%; padding: 0; float: left; display: inline-block; } .resume_right { width: 15%; margin-left: 0; padding: 0; float: right; display: inline-block; } .resume_job { font-size: 1.3rem; display: block; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 10px !important; padding: 0; } .resume_date { font-size: 1.1rem; } .resume_jobdesc { font-size: 1.1rem; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 15px; } .resume_section { font-size: 1.
